<s>Lucid Dreaming</s> - Recording dreams could make it easier for people to become aware of their dreams and potentially control them, leading to lucid dreaming experiences.
<s>Memory Enhancement</s> - Recording dreams could help people remember their dreams more clearly, which could lead to better memory retention and recall.
<s>Artistic Inspiration</s> - Artists could use recorded dreams as a source of inspiration for their work, potentially leading to new and innovative ideas.
<s>Therapy</s> - Recorded dreams could be used in therapy sessions to help patients explore their subconscious thoughts and emotions.
<s>Research</s> - Recording dreams could provide valuable data for researchers studying the human mind and its functions.
